# API Reference for cdktf.IPostProcessor

   IPostProcessor <a name="IPostProcessor" id="cdktf.IPostProcessor"></a>
  
  - *Implemented By:* <a href="#cdktf.IPostProcessor">IPostProcessor</a>
  
  A Token that can post-process the complete resolved value, after resolve() has recursed over it.
  
  # Methods <a name="Methods" id="Methods"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.IPostProcessor.postProcess">postProcess</a></code> | Process the completely resolved value, after full recursion/resolution has happened. |
  
  ---
  
  ## `postProcess` <a name="postProcess" id="cdktf.IPostProcessor.postProcess"></a>
  
  ```java
  public java.lang.Object postProcess(java.lang.Object input, IResolveContext context)
  ```
  
  Process the completely resolved value, after full recursion/resolution has happened.
  
  ### `input`<sup>Required</sup> <a name="input" id="cdktf.IPostProcessor.postProcess.parameter.input"></a>
  
  - *Type:* java.lang.Object
  
  ---
  
  ### `context`<sup>Required</sup> <a name="context" id="cdktf.IPostProcessor.postProcess.parameter.context"></a>
  
  - *Type:* <a href="#cdktf.IResolveContext">IResolveContext</a>
  
  ---
